title: Canadian General Investments, Limited Declares Dividends on Preference Shares
text:
July 29, 2015 13:47 ET Canadian General Investments, Limited Declares Dividends on Preference Shares 
TORONTO, CANADA--(Marketwired - July 29, 2015) - Canadian General Investments, Limited (TSX:CGI.PR.C)(TSX:CGI.PR.D) has declared quarterly dividends on its preference shares. 
A cash dividend of $0.24375 per share is payable on September 15, 2015 to shareholders of the Company's 3.90% Cumulative Redeemable Class A Preference Shares, Series 3 of record at the close of business on August 31, 2015. 
A cash dividend of $0.23438 per share is payable on September 15, 2015 to shareholders of the Company's 3.75% Cumulative Redeemable Class A Preference Shares, Series 4 of record at the close of business on August 31, 2015. 
These dividends are designated as "eligible dividends" for purposes of the Income Tax Act (Canada). Contact Information
